newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Elan says international division president to retire.
newsitem.headline: Elan says international division president to retire.

text.p: Irish-based drug company Elan Corporation Plc said on Wednesday that Kenneth McVey would retire as a director and as president of its international division with effect from the end of 1996.
McVey, who is 57, joined Elan in 1984 and was responsible for a number of areas including licensing, commercial development and intellectual property, Elan said in a statement.
